title: The category “Islamic art history” hinges on a religious definition, yet its ­relationship to the religion of Islam is ambiguous. reserving the locutions “Persian art” and “Turkish art” for other regions. Nevertheless, this discourse was not entirely secular, as it cast Islam along with climate and race in an essential and determinant role in “Arab art
